articles.title: IIT Kanpur prof finds 'Super Jupiter' exoplanet using James Webb telescope - Business Standard
articles.description: The newly discovered planet, more massive than Jupiter, orbits a K-type star Epsilon Indi A (Eps Ind A), which shares similarities in age with our Sun but is slightly cooler
